companyName: Invesco Exchange-Traded Self-Indexed Fund Trust - Invesco S&P 500 Equal Weight Communication Services ETF
description:
The investment seeks to track the investment results (before fees and expenses) of the S&P 500® Equal Weight Communication Services Plus Index (the "underlying index").
 The fund generally will invest at least 90% of its total assets in the securities that comprise the underlying index. The underlying index is an equal-weighted version of the S&P 500® Communication Services Index. The fund generally invests in all of the securities comprising the underlying index in proportion to their weightings in the underlying index. It is non-diversified.
